channel.title: Server Help Needed (New Players, Magic, Range)
channel.description:
I downloaded the moparscape client and i was usin the open source part. Well It will only allow me to make a player with all 99 stats wat if i wanted to make a different one that had the basic level three stats? Every time I put the stats for the donttouch folder down to 1 and health to 10 it wont let me make an account. It says exception something.
Magic, Range How do i add the ability to use and train magic and range to my server from the basic files given from the moparscape client?
Please Help me? everyone has called me a noob and left it at that.. and i agree i am one but i wanna learn to use java and I have no clue about what to start with. can someone explain to me?

item.title: Server Help Needed (New Players, Magic, Range)

yea i tried both of those it just wouldnt let me in for some reason…came up with a screen unaurthurized somethin…

item.title: Server Help Needed (New Players, Magic, Range)
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

i recomend downloading a source, other then hybridscape which is the defaul for moparscape client, after that, all new sources have the defauld set to lvl 3 or 4. Also i would recommend using silab, it does not glitch as much as mopar
